attributes.additional_details: Woodlands Sports Centre is an impressive multi-sport complex that could accommodate a community football, cricket  hockey, tennis, bowls, squash, badminton, table tennis, basketball and snooker club. In addition it could be used for endless social and business functions. At current the lease includes a restrictive covenant that does not allow the facility to be used as a community facility., which has resulted it this facility sitting dormant for ten years. We would the government to influence Peterborough City Council to relax this covenant.

rejection.details: Not for the Government to intervene with local decisions.  However, you may like to involve your MP in your campaign.
